body.name: Evenflo Revolve360 Extend All-in-One Rotational Car Seat with Quick Clean Cover (Rockland Green)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 20 mins
features: PROTECT WITH EXTENDED TIME REAR-FACING: Allows you to keep your child rear-facing for longer as recommended by child safety experts — all the way up to 50 lb.
GET IN AND OUT EFFORTLESSLY: 360° rotation makes it a breeze to get your child in and out of the car with just one hand — an award-winning innovation that keeps on giving
GROW UP WITH IT: Grows with your child for 10 years with 3 modes that adapt to every stage — rear-facing (4 to 50 lb), forward-facing (22 to 65 lb) and booster (40 to 120 lb)
SECURELY INSTALL WITH EASE: Install the Revolve360 once for rear and forward — Sure360 Safety Installation System with LockStrong and Tether360 keep it safe, secure and simple
KEEP IT FRESH: Offers the convenience of a Quick Clean Cover — easy to remove, easy to wash, easy to live with
RECLINE ON THE GO: Easily adjusts for maximum comfort without having to reinstall the seat or bother your baby
body.description: The revolution just got extended! The Evenflo® Revolve360™ Extend All-in-One Rotational Car Seat with Quick Clean Cover offers the extended security of rear-facing all the way up to 50 lb. Child safety experts say the longer your child remains rear-facing, the better, and the Revolve360 Extend is here to help with peace of mind all the way around. A spin-off of the Revolve360, America’s bestselling rotating car seat, the Revolve360 Extend offers one-hand, 360° rotation that makes it easy to get your child in and out of the car. This innovative car seat comes with a zip-on, ergonomic leg rest to add comfort for growing legs, as well as a handy Quick Clean Cover — easy to remove, easy to wash, easy to live with.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The rotating car seat is definitely worth it.
reviews.reviewText: I can't rave enough about this infant car seat! The 360-degree rotation feature has been a game-changer in simplifying the process of getting my child in and out of the seat. The convenience it offers is unmatched, especially during those hectic moments when every second counts.What truly sets this car seat apart is its thoughtful design. The rotation mechanism is smooth and effortless, ensuring both parent and child experience a stress-free transition. The two cup holders are an added bonus, providing a practical solution for keeping essentials within reach.Safety is, of course, paramount, and this car seat excels in that aspect as well. The sturdy construction and secure harness give me peace of mind while traveling. The attention to detail in both functionality and safety reassures me that I made the right choice for my little one.Overall, this infant car seat not only meets but exceeds my expectations. It's a well-engineered, user-friendly, and stylish solution for parents on the go. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a top-notch car seat that prioritizes both convenience and safety. It's a five-star winner in my book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The absolute best car seat
reviews.reviewText: Buy it. Just spend the money and buy it. This is the 3rd convertible car seat I’ve bought for my 2.5 yo and I wish I would have just spent the money and bought it the first time. I’ve had a Safety First car seat which was absolute garbage and unusable from the get, a Chicco convertible seat which is fine, but this blows them both out of the water. It is SO incredibly smooth and easy to use, easy to install, and tightens and adjusts So easily. The turning feature is an absolute game changer on its own, but the rest of the seats functionality is top of the line safe and easy. You absolutely will not regret buying this seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing convertible car seat
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, easy rotation, and adjustable positions. My daughter seems to really enjoy it and appears comfortable in her seat. Thrilled this will last for many years to come, even into booster seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: I love this car seat. The turning feature is so wonderful and convenient. Easy to install. I have tried multiple car seats and this is the best one to install, and I have never had a base feel so sturdy and secure! Worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not enough stars!!!
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is a game changer. My husband was in an accident 6 months ago making it difficult to load our little one into his seat. He is now able to do it with ease. The rotating function can be done with one hand. Fits well into out SUV. Excellent safety features that made it mom approved and a must buy. Most importantly it is little one approved. Comfortable for a short trip to the store or a long road trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the comfort and the function
reviews.reviewText: When my little one started to outgrow the carrier, I got this one and have loved it! I love the rotation feature, which makes getting him in and out so much easier. Didn’t need to, but took pieces apart to see how easy they would be to wash and it seems pretty easy. I love that the shoulder straps don’t have to be placed through new holes with growth—they adjust with the headrest. Little guy seems more comfortable in this seat. I was concerned that it would be bulkier and cause the front seat to need to be moved up, but really didn’t need any adjustment when compared to the infant carrier. I do miss pulling the carrier out when little guy is asleep, but that had to go at some point. We could have made the infant carrier model last much longer, and just not used it as a carrier. But I wanted a spare for the sitter and my sister, so the carrier is now spare.Only thing that dropped it down one star: the crotch buckle is pretty short. I have to dig for it to buckle and unbuckle. The position is adjustable, front to back, so put it on the front most setting. But my guy has very chunky thighs and I worry the buckle will into his thighs. I took it apart to see if I could extend the buckle strap—it does not lengthen. That should really be adjustable.UPDATE: I had to take the seat pad and the buckle cover off to wash (you know how it is) and found that without the extra padding the crotch buckle is more accessible. Easier to reach and not digging into his poor thick thighs. I am still trying to decide whether to put the cushion back. It does seem comfy but I can’t imagine that the buckle digging into his thighs is all that comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is worth every penny that I paid for it. I was hesitant to spend so much money on a car seat just so it would rotate, it seemed like it was a convenience thing that I needed to just get over and get a cheaper car seat. I decided to splurge and give it a shot and I am so glad I did. Purchased another one for my mom’s car. The ease of rotation is amazing and it is so convenient. I have short arms and struggle with reaching. The only downside I would say about this car seat is that it is kind of big. It barely fits in my car (Chevy Cruze) and that’s with the passenger seat pushed all the way up. No one can ride in my passenger seat when the seat is rotated towards the back. It also did not fit in my husbands truck (Chevy Silverado) that’s why it went into grandmas car (Chevy equinox) and fit a lot better. Contemplating buying a minivan so I can buy another one of these car seats for future kids. My car will definitely not fit 2 but the car seat is 100% worth it if you have the space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the car seat! Feels safe, my 8 month old loves it and seems so comfy, her head doesn’t fall forward while she’s napping either. Fits perfect in my Toyota Highlander and easily moves to my husbands F150. Very comfy, easy to move between cars and super convenient.

This is my second car seat of this style, and I would highly recommend it for anyone with toddlers. It’s easy to rotate them around and you don’t have to worry about struggling to get them in the car seat. If anyone ask me what car seat they recommend, this is the one!

Easy to install, baby is super comfy. Bought for a gmc sierra and a jeep wrangler, to make it easier to get growing baby in and out. So happy we went with the revolving seat. There are a lot of people who will say this seat isn’t safe however if it weren’t, it wouldn’t be approved in Canada. Just have to make sure seat is locked into position, which takes 0.5 of a second to do so.

Would highly recommend this for anyone on the market for a car seat. I can't imagine how difficult it would be using a regular car seat that doesn't rotate. Now that we're spoiled, I don't think I could ever go back. This should definitely be the standard for any family. When parked, rotate it facing towards any side so you can always interact with your baby easily.Installation is very simple. I honestly cannot imagine how people have difficulty here. It's all self explanatory and fits great. It's actually a smaller footprint than my infant car seat so I'm able to move my passenger seat back more.In Canada there aren't many options for rotating car seats. It's pretty much this or the cybex and this is far better in reviews with a much cheaper price tag. It's a no-brainer if you're on the market for a car seat!

reviews.reviewTitle: This is the car seat you need.
reviews.reviewText: Best car seat you can buy for you little one and yourself. It is a bit bulky but the convenience of rotating it to take the baby out is amazing. Plus effortless front facing and rear facing is also a great feature.

Safe for my child. She is 1 years old.We sadly had an accident, hit from behind on a RED light! but everyone was safe. No impact on my child. Thankfully.Amazing rotating feature.Comfy for the bum and head. Cup holders are Perfecto!Don't wear jackets, just sweater and a blanket is advised for the child's safety!It's bulky, I love it.Thank you! 😇A good purchase 👌
